title: Amy Gutman’s Father Fled the Nazis. She’s the New U.S. Ambassador to Germany.
description: For Amy Gutmann, a respected democracy scholar, her role as President Biden’s envoy to Germany is not a job, “it’s a mission,” one both professional and personal.
dc:creator: Katrin Bennhold
media:credit: Ingmar Björn Nolting for The New York Times
media:description: The U.S. ambassador to Germany, Amy Gutmann, during a visit to Nuremberg, where Hitler once addressed Nazi rallies and her father was an apprentice.
